array.string: Sundering Assault has a 50% chance to build 1 additional rage.
Sundering Assault has a 100% chance to build 1 additional rage.
Smash has a 50% chance to lower the accuracy of affected targets by 5% for 18 seconds.
Smash has a 100% chance to lower the accuracy of affected targets by 5% for 18 seconds.
Force Charge and Obliterate have a 33.34% chance to make the next Force Scream activated cost no rage.
Force Charge and Obliterate have a 66.68% chance to make the next Force Scream activated cost no rage.
Force Charge and Obliterate have a 100.02% chance to make the next Force Scream activated cost no rage.
Increases your melee and ranged defense by 2% while in Soresu Form.
Increases your melee and ranged defense by 4% while in Soresu Form.
Increases your melee and ranged defense by 6% while in Soresu Form.
Reduces the rage cost of Retaliation by 1 while Soresu Form is active.
Reduces the rage cost of Retaliation by 2 while Soresu Form is active.
Reduces the rage cost of Chilling Scream and Backhand by 1.
Reduces the rage cost of Chilling Scream and Backhand by 2.
Retaliation now increases melee and ranged defenses by 2% for 6.
Retaliation now increases melee and ranged defenses by 4% for 12.
Retaliation now increases melee and ranged defenses by 6% for 18.
Reduces all damage taken by 40% for 10.
Reduces the cooldown of Unleash by 15.
Reduces the cooldown of Unleash by 30.
Increases the damage dealt by Backhand, Smash and Sweeping Slash by 5%.
Increases the damage dealt by Backhand, Smash and Sweeping Slash by 10%.
Increases the damage dealt by Backhand, Smash and Sweeping Slash by 15%.

While in Soresu Form, parrying, deflecting, shielding or resisting an attack has a 25% chance to grant Revenge, reducing the rage cost of your next Force Scream or Smash by 1. Lasts 10 seconds and stacks up to 3 times.

While in Soresu Form, parrying, deflecting, shielding or resisting an attack has a 50% chance to grant Revenge, reducing the rage cost of your next Force Scream or Smash by 1. Lasts 10 seconds and stacks up to 3 times.
Reduces the cooldown of Threatening Scream and Force Push by 7.5 seconds.
Reduces the cooldown of Threatening Scream and Force Push by 15 seconds.
Force Choke no longer needs to be channeled, applying its full effect over 3 seconds.
Bashes the target for (current weapon) kinetic damage, stunning it for 4. This ability generates a high amount of threat.
Force Charge now stuns the target for 2.
Force Scream has a 50% chance to grant Sonic Barrier, which absorbs a moderate amount of damage. Lasts 10 seconds.
Force Scream has a 100% chance to grant Sonic Barrier, which absorbs a moderate amount of damage. Lasts 20 seconds.
Increases the duration of Endure Pain by 2 seconds. Increases elemental and internal damage reduction by 2.5%.
Increases the duration of Endure Pain by 4 seconds. Increases elemental and internal damage reduction by 5%.
Increases the frequency at which Soresu Form can generate rage by 33.34. In addition, Sweeping Slash and Vicious Slash have a 1% chance to reduce the active cooldown of Enrage by ?.
Increases the frequency at which Soresu Form can generate rage by 66.68. In addition, Sweeping Slash and Vicious Slash have a 2% chance to reduce the active cooldown of Enrage by ?.
Increases the frequency at which Soresu Form can generate rage by 100.02. In addition, Sweeping Slash and Vicious Slash have a 3% chance to reduce the active cooldown of Enrage by ?.

Crushes the target with a mighty blow, dealing (current weapon) weapon damage and applying 3 stacks of armor reduction for (current weapon) seconds. Targets affected by 5 stacks of your armor reduction suffer 15 weapon damage instead.
Sundering Assault has a 50% chance to apply one additional stack of sunder armor.
Sundering Assault has a 100% chance to apply one additional stack of sunder armor.
Increases the damage dealt by Smash by 10% and lowers its cooldown by 1.
Increases the damage dealt by Smash by 20% and lowers its cooldown by 2.
Increases the damage dealt by Smash by 30% and lowers its cooldown by 3.
Increases melee damage by 2% while in Shien Form and Shii-Cho Form.
Increases melee damage by 4% while in Shien Form and Shii-Cho Form.
Increases melee damage by 6% while in Shien Form and Shii-Cho Form.
Generates 2 rage when stunned, put to sleep or knocked down.
Generates 4 rage when stunned, put to sleep or knocked down.
Increases the accuracy of melee and Force attacks by 1%
Increases the accuracy of melee and Force attacks by 2%
Increases the accuracy of melee and Force attacks by 3%
Whenever your movement is impaired, you gain a 5% bonus to your next melee ability that costs rage. This effect can stack up to 5 times and lasts 10 seconds.
Whenever your movement is impaired, you gain a 10% bonus to your next melee ability that costs rage. This effect can stack up to 5 times and lasts 10 seconds.
Force Charge has a 50% chance to grant Unstoppable, reducing all damage taken by 20% and granting immunity to interrupts and all controlling effects for 4 seconds.
Force Charge has a 100% chance to grant Unstoppable, reducing all damage taken by 20% and granting immunity to interrupts and all controlling effects for 8 seconds.

Enters an aggressive lightsaber form, increasing all damage dealt by 6%. All attacks that cost rage will refund 1 rage when used. In addition, you generate 1 rage when attacked, but this effect cannot occur more than once every 6 seconds.
Force Scream has a 50% chance to cause the target to bleed for (current weapon) damage over 6 seconds.
Force Scream has a 100% chance to cause the target to bleed for (current weapon) damage over 12 seconds.
Reduces the cooldown of Impale by 2 and Force Scream by 1.
Reduces the cooldown of Impale by 4 and Force Scream by 2.
Reduces the cooldown of Impale by 6 and Force Scream by 3.
Generates 1 additional rage when taking area effect damage while Shien Form is active.
Increases total Endurance by 50%. In addition, Intercede has a 2% chance of applying its effect to you as well.
Increases total Endurance by 100%. In addition, Intercede has a 4% chance of applying its effect to you as well.
Impale has a 50% chance to cause the target to bleed for (current weapon) internal damage over 6 seconds.
Impale has a 100% chance to cause the target to bleed for (current weapon) internal damage over 6 seconds.
Impales the target for (current weapon) weapon damage.
Impale and Shatter have a 50% chance to increase the critical hit chance of Force Scream and Vicious Throw by 60% for 9 seconds.
Impale and Shatter have a 100% chance to increase the critical hit chance of Force Scream and Vicious Throw by 60% for 9 seconds.
Reduces all damage taken by 2%. Additionally reduces the cooldown of Intimidating Roar by 7.5.
Reduces all damage taken by 4%. Additionally reduces the cooldown of Intimidating Roar by 15.
Impale and Shatter have a 10% chance to finish the cooldown on Ravage. This effect cannot occur more than once every 15 seconds. Each rank beyond the first reduces this rate limit by 3 seconds.
Impale and Shatter have a 20% chance to finish the cooldown on Ravage. This effect cannot occur more than once every 15 seconds. Each rank beyond the first reduces this rate limit by 3 seconds.
Impale and Shatter have a 30% chance to finish the cooldown on Ravage. This effect cannot occur more than once every 15 seconds. Each rank beyond the first reduces this rate limit by 3 seconds.

Channels the Force into your lightsaber and crushes your target under its weight, dealing (current weapon) internal damage to a target afflicted by Sundering Assault, with a further (current weapon) internal damage over 12 seconds.
Increases the duration of Force Charge's Immobilize effect by 0.5.
Increases the duration of Force Charge's Immobilize effect by 1.
Increases the critical strike chance of your Force attacks by 2%.
Increases the critical strike chance of your Force attacks by 4%.
Increases the critical strike chance of your Force attacks by 6%.
Reduces the cooldown of Ravage by 5 and Force Choke by 1.5.
Reduces the cooldown of Ravage by 10 and Force Choke by 3.
Increases the critical strike chance of Vicious Slash by 7.5%.
Increases the critical strike chance of Vicious Slash by 15%.
You now generate 1 rage when attacked in Shii-Cho Form. This effect cannot occur more than once every 6 seconds.
Reduces the cooldown of all Force abilities while in Shii-Cho Form by 1.5.
Reduces the cooldown of all Force abilities while in Shii-Cho Form by 3.
Unleash has a 50% chance to heal you for 10% of your maximum health.
Unleash has a 100% chance to heal you for 10% of your maximum health.
Reduces the pushback suffered while channeling Force Choke by 50%.
Reduces the pushback suffered while channeling Force Choke by 100%.
Jumps to a target, impaling it for (current weapon) weapon damage. Strikes with both weapons if dual wielding.
Increases the damage dealt by Vicious Slash and Obliterate by 3%.
Increases the damage dealt by Vicious Slash and Obliterate by 6%.
Each tick of Force Choke and Force Crush grants you Shockwave, increasing the damage your next Smash deals by 12.5%. Stacks up to 4 times.
Each tick of Force Choke and Force Crush grants you Shockwave, increasing the damage your next Smash deals by 25%. Stacks up to 4 times.
Force Charge and Obliterate have a 50% chance to make your next Smash used within 15 seconds an automatic critical hit.
Force Charge and Obliterate have a 100% chance to make your next Smash used within 15 seconds an automatic critical hit.
While in Shii-Cho Form, your attacks ignore 10% of your targets' armor.
While in Shii-Cho Form, your attacks ignore 20% of your targets' armor.
Increases movement speed by 20% for 5 seconds after using Obliterate.
Increases movement speed by 40% for 10 seconds after using Obliterate.
Reduces the rage cost of all movement-slowing effects by 1.
Lowers the cooldown of Saber Throw by 2.5 seconds and causes Saber Throw to apply 1 of sunder armor to the target.
Lowers the cooldown of Saber Throw by 5 seconds and causes Saber Throw to apply 2 of sunder armor to the target.
Increases the critical strike damage of all Force attacks by 10%.
Increases the critical strike damage of all Force attacks by 20%.
Increases the critical strike damage of all Force attacks by 30%.

Progressively slows the target from 60% to 10% movement speed over 5 and deals (current weapon) kinetic damage each second. At the end of the duration, the target is crushed and takes an additional (current weapon) kinetic damage.
